Articles.Content: Several years ago, I remember hearing about a mod that re-establishes tumble after coming out of warp. Does anybody remember what that was and if it (or something like that) is still around?

Nevermind. I found it. Oddly enough, it's called "Persistent Rotation." I must have misspelled something when I searched for it.

Edited November 25, 2023 by dozerman
Got name wrong
